## Source: ossf-package-analysis (07b95436e2a145afcd7f459f6101c1d1b699d4d5842126d920fe77f700c8899b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'django-pyyaml' @ 20.17.15 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
